tool_description: Unlock email delivery success with our BounceWatch  API - your essential tool for ensuring messages reach their destination flawlessly.
name: BounceWatch - Email Bounce Check API
title: BounceWatch - Email Bounce Check API

api_list.name: Single Email
api_list.description: Provides information about a single email address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bouncewatch-email-bounce-check-api.p.rapidapi.com/single-email/zuck@fb.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bouncewatch-email-bounce-check-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bouncewatch-email-bounce-check-api.p.rapidapi.com/single-email/{email_address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bouncewatch-email-bounce-check-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
